eg

Class CurrentProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.CurrentProject

  • public class CurrentProject
extends java.lang.Object
    The managing of projects.

    A project is represented by an object of type ProjectActions and is configured and/or set active depending on the TextDocument that is set as selected at the time.

    Several configured projects are stored in a List of projects. Any of these can be (re-) activated depending on the currently set TextDocument

      • createNewProject

        public void createNewProject()
        Creates a new project

      • retrieveProject

        public void retrieveProject()
        Tries to assign to this current project a project which a configuration exists for in a local 'eadconfig' file or in the program's 'prefs' file.

        Assignment of the project to this current project (setting the project active) will happen only if no other project was assigned before. However, if a local 'config' is found the project is always added to this list of configured projects.

      • openSettingsWindow

        public void openSettingsWindow()
        Opens the window of the SettingsWin object that belongs to a project.

        Depending on the currently set TextDocument the opened window belongs to the current project, to one of this listed projects that were set before or to a newly created project.

      • changeProject

        public void changeProject()
        Assigns to this current project the project from this List of configured projects which the currently selected TextDocument belongs to.

        If the currently set TextDocument does not belong to a listed project it is asked to set up a new project.

      • updateFileTree

        public void updateFileTree(java.lang.String path)
        Updates the file tree of FileTree if the specified directory includes the project's root directory.
        Parameters:
        path - the directory that may include the project's root directory See FileTree.updateTree()

      • compile

        public void compile()
        Compiles this current project
